origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'ManufacturingAPI.get_policy_regulations', 'description': 'This function provides the latest policy regulations for the manufacturing sector in a specified country and year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'country', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The country for which the policy regulations are requested.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the policy regulations are requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'regulations', 'description': 'A list of policy regulations applicable to the manufacturing sector.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 ManufacturingAPI.get_policy_regulations, 它的参数输入如下: 'country'是'China', 'year'是'2023'.
